pageContext.claim: “And by the way, the court -- [revoking DACA] wasn't me. The courts were not upholding that executive order.”
pageContext.analysis: DACA was upheld in the Supreme Court. DAPA, which provided a path for parents of U.S. citizens who were illegal immigrants, was rescinded. DACA was revoked by President Trump. Plus, President Obama acknowledged when he issued the executive orders that he would have preferred a legislative approach.
